example.eg: Have you reached Philadelphia yet?  If not, keep driving.
example.egtrans: 你到费城了吗？要是还没到，就接着开。

example.eg: Can you reach the glasses on the top shelf?
example.egtrans: 你能够着顶层架子上的玻璃杯吗？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 伸手够, 够得着, 伸, 伸出, 伸手

example.eg: Let me see if I can reach him to ask him about the party.
example.egtrans: 我试试能不能联系上他，问问他晚会的事儿。

example.eg: The train reached its destination on time.
example.egtrans: 火车准时到达了目的地。

example.eg: His legs were so long they reached the end of the bed.
example.egtrans: 他的腿特别长，能伸到床的另一头。

example.eg: The temperature is expected to reach 30°C today.
example.egtrans: 今天气温预计达到30摄氏度。

example.eg: He felt lucky to have reached the age of ninety.
example.egtrans: 他能达到九十岁高龄，感到自己非常幸运。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达到（某个年纪）, 活到

example.eg: He reached for the book.
The glasses on the top shelf are beyond her reach.
example.egtrans: 顶层架子上的玻璃杯太高，她够不着。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 臂展, 手臂达到的距离

example.eg: That idea is beyond the reach of most students.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 理解力, 可理解的范围

example.eg: The reach of the storm extended all the way to California.
She reached towards the ceiling to stretch her sore muscles.
example.egtrans: 她伸了个懒腰，舒展自己酸痛的肌肉。

example.eg: The sound reaches far, but nobody is listening.
example.egtrans: 那声音传得很远，却没有人在听。

example.eg: Joe reached into the drawer and pulled out a notebook and pen.
He reached his hand down to pick the paper off the floor.
The charity collection reached thirty thousand dollars this year.

dsense.name: reach [sth]
dsense.guideword: (go as far as) (指能力、实力等)

example.eg: We have just enough gas to reach the next service station.
example.egtrans: 我们有足够燃料，能撑到下一个服务站。

dsense.name: reach [sb]⇒
dsense.guideword: (TV, radio: be seen by) (电视、广播等)

example.eg: This show reaches thousands of teenagers.
I've explained the problem to him many times, but you just can't reach him.
He reached across and stroked me on the cheek.
Susie knocked my wine glass over when she reached across the table to get the salt.
Graceful elm trees reached across the garden path.
Instead of apologising for his mistakes, Don always reaches for excuses.
The interviewer reached out to shake Neil's hand.
When the girl fell over, her father reached out a hand to help her up.
I tried to reach out to the family in their time of need.
example.egtrans: 在家人需要的时候，我会试着与他们交流。

example.eg: She had to reach over the sink to open the kitchen window.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 伸手去够..., 伸手拿..., 伸手越过...

example.eg: To avoid accidents, make sure that the appliance and its power cord are beyond reach of children.
We placed a mobile above the cot, just beyond reach, so the baby had to grab at it.
He proved that no dream was beyond reach if we were willing to work for it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达不到的, 实现不了的

example.eg: They successfully used the internet to give them a broad reach to a whole new class of voters.

dsense.name: hit rock bottom, hit bottom, reach rock bottom
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (reach lowest, worst level) (比喻义)

example.eg: Mike hit rock bottom when he failed all his exams.
I could almost touch the ceiling, but it was just out of reach.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 够不到地, 摸不到地

example.eg: On my salary, a new Ferrari is out of reach.

dsense.name: out of the reach of [sb], out of [sb]'s reach

example.eg: Your pills should be out of the reach of children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 超出范围的, 够不着的

example.eg: It's hard for people to reach a compromise when their goals are very different.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达成协议, 达成和解, 达成妥协

example.eg: After seven months of negotiations the union and management have finally reached agreement.
Greg reached down to give the little girl a flower.

dsense.name: reach for the brass ring, go for the brass ring

trans_examp.trans_cn: 做比摘星星都难的事, 雄心勃勃

example.eg: Some farm animals can take up to three years to reach maturity.
Some people become so dependent on pornography that they can't reach orgasm without it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达到性高潮, 达到性兴奋点

dsense.name: reach the end of your rope, be at the end of your rope, also UK: reach the end of your tether, be at the end of your tether

example.eg: I need a break from the kids; I've reached the end of my rope!
You may need to change trains and take a bus before you reach your destination.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 抵达目的地, 到达目的地

example.eg: You'll never reach your goal without a lot of hard work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 达成目标, 完成目标

example.eg: Medicines should not be stored within reach of children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 触手可及地, 够得到

example.eg: Solar powered cities are within reach.
